execution_plan.description: Find customer IDs that have placed more than 2 orders AND have purchased at least 3 order items (counts aggregated across all their orders).
execution_plan.query:
SELECT o.customer_id
FROM Orders o
LEFT JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
GROUP BY o.customer_id
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) > 2
   AND COUNT(oi.order_item_id) >= 3;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve id, first name and last name for the customers identified in step 1.
